item.title: I-80 West - Exit 364
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 364 - BL-80/WY-212/College Drive/To E Lincolnway.

item.title: US-30/BL-80 West at I-180/US-85/BL-25
item.description: US-30/BL-80 West at I-180/US-85/BL-25 in downtown Cheyenne (W Lincolnway at Warren Ave.). Turn right on Warren Ave. for BL-25/US-85 North; continue one block and then left for I-180/US-85/BL-25 south. Continue straight on W Lincolnway for US-30/BL-80 West.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 358
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 358 - West Lincolnway. This is the western end of the Cheyenne business loop. US-30 rejoins I-80 here westbound.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 364
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 364 - BL-80/WY-212/College Drive/To E. Lincolnway. This is the eastern edge of the Cheyenne business loop. College Drive acts as a beltway around the northeast side of Cheyenne.

item.title: BL-80/US-30 East at I-180 South
item.description: BL-80/US-30 East at I-180/BL-25/US-85/US-87 South to Denver.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 9 (US-30 Jct)
item.description: I-25 Exit 9 offramp at BL-80/US-30. Turn right for BL-80/US-30 for I-80 West/Laramie. Turn left on BL-80/US-30 East to Cheyenne/West Lincolnway.

item.title: I-80 East Exits 358/359A
item.description: I-80 Overhead at BL-80/W Lincolnway and I-25
